injury.name: Unresolved Trauma
injury.description: * While you have Unresolved Trauma, you are Strange. * You can not use "Charming" skills. * This overrides any character traits you might already have (if you were Charming, now you are Strange). * If you were already Strange: take one Corruption point at the end of every Combat. * A successful FINANCIAL AID (Empathy) check can downgrade this to Stress. * After two nights of rest, downgrade this to Massive, Painful Scar.
